entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is mentioned as the one yelling "Harry, I think I'm doing it!". He is described as having been working on something.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned in Seamus' yell, indicating that he is likely someone who knows or is related to Seamus.

relationships.description: Seamus mentions Harry in his yell, suggesting a relationship between the two.
